sentences.sContent: He was looking forward to working with the new manager.
sentences.sCn: 他很期待和新经理一起工作。

sentences.sContent: He now says that he's looking forward to increased trade after the war.
sentences.sCn: 他现在说他正期盼着战后的贸易增长。

trans.tranOther: If you look forward to something that is going to happen, you want it to happen because you think you will enjoy it
